price: Ādam, kí ìwọ àti ìyàwó rẹ máa gbé nínú Ọgbà Ìdẹ̀ra. Nítorí náà, ẹ máa jẹ níbikíbi tí ẹ bá fẹ́. Kí ẹ sì má ṣe súnmọ́ igi yìí nítorí kí ẹ má baà wà nínú àwọn alábòsí.
arabic: وَيَٰٓـَٔادَمُ ٱسۡكُنۡ أَنتَ وَزَوۡجُكَ ٱلۡجَنَّةَ فَكُلَا مِنۡ حَيۡثُ شِئۡتُمَا وَلَا تَقۡرَبَا هَٰذِهِ ٱلشَّجَرَةَ فَتَكُونَا مِنَ ٱلظَّٰلِمِينَ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: wayāādamu us'kun anta wazawjuka al-janata fakulā min ḥaythu shi'tumā walā taqrabā hādhihi al-shajarata fatakūnā mina al-ẓālimīna
